Uses of AuctionReport in uk.ac.liv.auction.stats
 

Classes in uk.ac.liv.auction.stats that implement AuctionReport
 class AbstractAuctionReport
           An abstract implementation of AuctionReport that provides functionality common to all reports.
 class AbstractMarketStatsReport
          A report that performs additional calculations at the end of an auction before producing its results.
 class AgentPayoffReport
          A report that lists the ratio of actual to theoretical profits of each agent group in the auction.
 class AuctionStateStats
           
 class CombiAuctionReport
           A report that combines several different reports.
 class ComplexityReport
           
 class CSVReport
          A report that records data in CSV (comma-separated values) files.
 class DailyStatsReport
          A report that collects price statistics for each trading day.
 class DataWriterReport
          This class writes auction data to the specified DataWriter objects, and thus can be used to log data to eg, CSV files, a database backend, etc.
 class DirectRevelationReport
          This class computes the hypothetical auction state when all agents bid at their private valuation, ie when all agents bid truthfully.
 class DynamicSurplusReport
           A report that keeps track of the surplus available to each agent in theoretical equilibrium.
 class EquilibriumReport
           A class to calculate the true equilibrium price and quantity ranges for a given auction.
 class FreeChartReport
          A report that logs data to JFreeChart graphs.
 class GraphReport
           A report that logs data to a RePast graph sequence.
 class GroupPayoffReport
          A report that lists the ratio of actual to theoretical profits of each agent group in the auction.
 class HistoricalDataReport
           A report that keeps a historical record of the shouts in the market that lead to the last N transactions.
 class MeanValueDataWriterReport
          This report keeps track of the mean value of each market variable over the course of each round of bidding and logs the mean value to the specified DataWriter objects.
 class PayoffReport
           
 class PriceStatisticsReport
           A report that keeps cummulative statistics on bid prices, ask prices, transaction prices, and market quote prices.
 class ReportedSupplyAndDemandStats
          A class to calculate the supply and demand curves and write them to the specified DataWriters.
 class ReportVariableBoardUpdater
          A class updates values of major ReportVariables on ReportVariableBoard.
 class ReportVariableWriterReport
          This class writes auction data to the specified DataWriter objects, and thus can be used to log data to eg, CSV files, a database backend, etc.
 class StrategyPayoffReport
          A report that lists the ratio of actual to theoretical profits of each strategy being played in the auction.
 class SupplyAndDemandStats
           
 class SurplusReport
          A report that calculates the actual surplus of buyers and sellers in the auction verses the theoretical surplus when trades occur at the equilibrium price.
 class TrueSupplyAndDemandStats
          A class to calculate the supply and demand curves and write them to the specified DataWriters.
 class VeracityReport
